verses.verse: Now it came to pass,<WH1961> when Adoni-zedek<WH139> king<WH4428> of Jerusalem<WH3389> had heard<WH8085> how<WH3588> Joshua<WH3091> had taken<WH3920> <WH853> Ai,<WH5857> and had utterly destroyed<WH2763> it; as<WH834> he had done<WH6213> to Jericho<WH3405> and her king,<WH4428> so<WH3651> he had done<WH6213> to Ai<WH5857> and her king;<WH4428> and how<WH3588> the inhabitants<WH3427> of Gibeon<WH1391> had made peace<WH7999> with<WH854> Israel,<WH3478> and were<WH1961> among<WH7130> them;

That they feared<WH3372> greatly,<WH3966> because<WH3588> Gibeon<WH1391> was a great<WH1419> city,<WH5892> as one<WH259> of the royal<WH4467> cities,<WH5892> and because<WH3588> it<WH1931> was greater<WH1419> than<WH4480> Ai,<WH5857> and all<WH3605> the men<WH376> thereof were mighty.<WH1368>

Wherefore Adoni-zedek<WH139> king<WH4428> of Jerusalem<WH3389> sent<WH7971> unto<WH413> Hoham<WH1944> king<WH4428> of Hebron,<WH2275> and unto<WH413> Piram<WH6502> king<WH4428> of Jarmuth,<WH3412> and unto<WH413> Japhia<WH3309> king<WH4428> of Lachish,<WH3923> and unto<WH413> Debir<WH1688> king<WH4428> of Eglon,<WH5700> saying,<WH559>

Come up<WH5927> unto<WH413> me, and help<WH5826> me, that we may smite<WH5221> <WH853> Gibeon:<WH1391> for<WH3588> it hath made peace<WH7999> with<WH854> Joshua<WH3091> and with<WH854> the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>

Therefore the five<WH2568> kings<WH4428> of the Amorites,<WH567> the king<WH4428> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> the king<WH4428> of Hebron,<WH2275> the king<WH4428> of Jarmuth,<WH3412> the king<WH4428> of Lachish,<WH3923> the king<WH4428> of Eglon,<WH5700> gathered themselves together,<WH622> and went up,<WH5927> they<WH1992> and all<WH3605> their hosts,<WH4264> and encamped<WH2583> before<WH5921> Gibeon,<WH1391> and made war<WH3898> against<WH5921> it.

And the men<WH376> of Gibeon<WH1391> sent<WH7971> unto<WH413> Joshua<WH3091> to<WH413> the camp<WH4264> to Gilgal,<WH1537> saying,<WH559> Slack<WH7503> not<WH408> thy hand<WH3027> from thy servants;<WH4480> <WH5650> come up<WH5927> to<WH413> us quickly,<WH4120> and save<WH3467> us, and help<WH5826> us: for<WH3588> all<WH3605> the kings<WH4428> of the Amorites<WH567> that dwell<WH3427> in the mountains<WH2022> are gathered together<WH6908> against<WH413> us.

So Joshua<WH3091> ascended<WH5927> from<WH4480> Gilgal,<WH1537> he,<WH1931> and all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> of war<WH4421> with<WH5973> him, and all<WH3605> the mighty men<WH1368> of valor.<WH2428>

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto<WH413> Joshua,<WH3091> Fear<WH3372> them not:<WH408> for<WH3588> I have delivered<WH5414> them into thine hand;<WH3027> there shall not<WH3808> a man<WH376> of<WH4480> them stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> thee.
Joshua <WH3091> therefore came<WH935> unto<WH413> them suddenly,<WH6597> and went up<WH5927> from<WH4480> Gilgal<WH1537> all<WH3605> night.<WH3915>

And the LORD<WH3068> discomfited<WH2000> them before<WH6440> Israel,<WH3478> and slew<WH5221> them with a great<WH1419> slaughter<WH4347> at Gibeon,<WH1391> and chased<WH7291> them along the way<WH1870> that goeth up<WH4608> to Beth-horon,<WH1032> and smote<WH5221> them to<WH5704> Azekah,<WH5825> and unto<WH5704> Makkedah.<WH4719>

And it came to pass,<WH1961> as they fled<WH5127> from before<WH4480> <WH6440> Israel,<WH3478> and were in the going down<WH4174> to Beth-horon,<WH1032> that the LORD<WH3068> cast down<WH7993> great<WH1419> stones<WH68> from<WH4480> heaven<WH8064> upon<WH5921> them unto<WH5704> Azekah,<WH5825> and they died:<WH4191> they were more<WH7227> which<WH834> died<WH4191> with hailstones<WH1259> <WH68> than they whom<WH4480> <WH834> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> slew<WH2026> with the sword.<WH2719>

Then <WH227> spoke<WH1696> Joshua<WH3091> to the LORD<WH3068> in the day<WH3117> when the LORD<WH3068> delivered up<WH5414> <WH853> the Amorites<WH567> before<WH6440> the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and he said<WH559> in the sight<WH5869> of Israel,<WH3478> Sun,<WH8121> stand thou still<WH1826> upon Gibeon;<WH1391> and thou, Moon,<WH3394> in the valley<WH6010> of Ajalon.<WH357>

And the sun<WH8121> stood still,<WH1826> and the moon<WH3394> stayed,<WH5975> until<WH5704> the people<WH1471> had avenged<WH5358> themselves upon their enemies.<WH341> Is not<WH3808> this<WH1931> written<WH3789> in<WH5921> the book<WH5612> of Jasher?<WH3477> So the sun<WH8121> stood<WH5975> still in the midst<WH2677> of heaven,<WH8064> and hasted<WH213> not<WH3808> to go down<WH935> about a whole<WH8549> day.<WH3117>

And there was<WH1961> no<WH3808> day<WH3117> like that<WH1931> before<WH6440> it or after<WH310> it, that the LORD<WH3068> hearkened<WH8085> unto the voice<WH6963> of a man:<WH376> for<WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> fought<WH3898> for Israel.<WH3478>
And Joshua<WH3091> returned,<WH7725> and all<WH3605> Israel<WH3478> with<WH5973> him, unto<WH413> the camp<WH4264> to Gilgal.<WH1537>
But these<WH428> five<WH2568> kings<WH4428> fled,<WH5127> and hid themselves<WH2244> in a cave<WH4631> at Makkedah.<WH4719>
And it was told<WH5046> Joshua,<WH3091> saying,<WH559> The five<WH2568> kings<WH4428> are found<WH4672> hid<WH2244> in a cave<WH4631> at Makkedah.<WH4719>
And Joshua<WH3091> said,<WH559> Roll<WH1556> great<WH1419> stones<WH68> upon<WH413> the mouth<WH6310> of the cave,<WH4631> and set<WH6485> men<WH376> by<WH5921> it for to keep<WH8104> them:

And stay<WH5975> ye<WH859> not,<WH408> but pursue<WH7291> after<WH310> your enemies,<WH341> and smite the hindmost<WH2179> of them; suffer<WH5414> them not<WH408> to enter<WH935> into<WH413> their cities:<WH5892> for<WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> hath delivered<WH5414> them into your hand.<WH3027>

And it came to pass,<WH1961> when Joshua<WH3091> and the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> had made an end<WH3615> of slaying<WH5221> them with a very<WH3966> great<WH1419> slaughter,<WH4347> till<WH5704> they were consumed,<WH8552> that the rest<WH8300> which remained<WH8277> of<WH4480> them entered<WH935> into<WH413> fenced<WH4013> cities.<WH5892>

And all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> returned<WH7725> to<WH413> the camp<WH4264> to<WH413> Joshua<WH3091> at Makkedah<WH4719> in peace:<WH7965> none<WH3808> moved<WH2782> <WH853> his tongue<WH3956> against any<WH376> of the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>

Then said<WH559> Joshua,<WH3091> Open<WH6605> <WH853> the mouth<WH6310> of the cave,<WH4631> and bring out<WH3318> <WH853> those<WH428> five<WH2568> kings<WH4428> unto<WH413> me out of<WH4480> the cave.<WH4631>

And they did<WH6213> so,<WH3651> and brought forth<WH3318> <WH853> those<WH428> five<WH2568> kings<WH4428> unto<WH413> him out of<WH4480> the cave,<WH4631> <WH853> the king<WH4428> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> <WH853> the king<WH4428> of Hebron,<WH2275> <WH853> the king<WH4428> of Jarmuth,<WH3412> <WH853> the king<WH4428> of Lachish,<WH3923> and<WH853> the king<WH4428> of Eglon.<WH5700>

And it came to pass,<WH1961> when they brought out<WH3318> <WH853> those<WH428> kings<WH4428> unto<WH413> Joshua,<WH3091> that Joshua<WH3091> called<WH7121> for<WH413> all<WH3605> the men<WH376> of Israel,<WH3478> and said<WH559> unto<WH413> the captains<WH7101> of the men<WH376> of war<WH4421> which went<WH1980> with<WH854> him, Come near,<WH7126> put<WH7760> <WH853> your feet<WH7272> upon<WH5921> the necks<WH6677> of these<WH428> kings.<WH4428> And they came near,<WH7126> and put<WH7760> <WH853> their feet<WH7272> upon<WH5921> the necks<WH6677> of them.

And Joshua<WH3091> said<WH559> unto<WH413> them, Fear<WH3372> not,<WH408> nor<WH408> be dismayed,<WH2865> be strong<WH2388> and of good courage:<WH553> for<WH3588> thus<WH3602> shall the LORD<WH3068> do<WH6213> to all<WH3605> your enemies<WH341> against whom<WH834> <WH853> ye<WH859> fight.<WH3898>

And afterward<WH310> <WH3651> Joshua<WH3091> smote<WH5221> them, and slew<WH4191> them, and hanged<WH8518> them on<WH5921> five<WH2568> trees:<WH6086> and they were<WH1961> hanging<WH8518> upon<WH5921> the trees<WH6086> until<WH5704> the evening.<WH6153>

And it came to pass<WH1961> at the time<WH6256> of the going down<WH935> of the sun,<WH8121> that Joshua<WH3091> commanded,<WH6680> and they took them down<WH3381> off the trees,<WH4480> <WH5921> <WH6086> and cast<WH7993> them into<WH413> the cave<WH4631> wherein<WH834> <WH8033> they had been hid,<WH2244> and laid<WH7760> great<WH1419> stones<WH68> in<WH5921> the cave's<WH4631> mouth,<WH6310> which remain until<WH5704> this<WH2088> very<WH6106> day.<WH3117>

And that<WH1931> day<WH3117> Joshua<WH3091> took<WH3920> Makkedah,<WH4719> and smote<WH5221> it with the edge<WH6310> of the sword,<WH2719> and the king<WH4428> thereof he utterly destroyed<WH2763> them, and all<WH3605> the souls<WH5315> that<WH834> were therein; he let<WH7604> none<WH3808> remain:<WH8300> and he did<WH6213> to the king<WH4428> of Makkedah<WH4719> as<WH834> he did<WH6213> unto the king<WH4428> of Jericho.<WH3405>
Then Joshua<WH3091> passed<WH5674> from Makkedah,<WH4480> <WH4719> and all<WH3605> Israel<WH3478> with<WH5973> him, unto Libnah,<WH3841> and fought<WH3898> against<WH5973> Libnah: <WH3841>

And the LORD<WH3068> delivered<WH5414> it also,<WH1571> and the king<WH4428> thereof, into the hand<WH3027> of Israel;<WH3478> and he smote<WH5221> it with the edge<WH6310> of the sword,<WH2719> and all<WH3605> the souls<WH5315> that<WH834> were therein; he let<WH7604> none<WH3808> remain<WH8300> in it; but did<WH6213> unto the king<WH4428> thereof as<WH834> he did<WH6213> unto the king<WH4428> of Jericho.<WH3405>

And Joshua<WH3091> passed<WH5674> from Libnah,<WH4480> <WH3841> and all<WH3605> Israel<WH3478> with<WH5973> him, unto Lachish,<WH3923> and encamped<WH2583> against<WH5921> it, and fought<WH3898> against it:

And the LORD<WH3068> delivered<WH5414> <WH853> Lachish<WH3923> into the hand<WH3027> of Israel,<WH3478> which took<WH3920> it on the second<WH8145> day,<WH3117> and smote<WH5221> it with the edge<WH6310> of the sword,<WH2719> and all<WH3605> the souls<WH5315> that<WH834> were therein, according to all<WH3605> that<WH834> he had done<WH6213> to Libnah.<WH3841>

Then <WH227> Horam<WH2036> king<WH4428> of Gezer<WH1507> came up<WH5927> to help<WH5826> <WH853> Lachish;<WH3923> and Joshua<WH3091> smote<WH5221> him and his people,<WH5971> until<WH5704> he had left<WH7604> him none<WH1115> remaining.<WH8300>

And from Lachish<WH4480> <WH3923> Joshua<WH3091> passed<WH5674> unto Eglon,<WH5700> and all<WH3605> Israel<WH3478> with<WH5973> him; and they encamped<WH2583> against<WH5921> it, and fought<WH3898> against<WH5921> it:

And they took<WH3920> it on that<WH1931> day,<WH3117> and smote<WH5221> it with the edge<WH6310> of the sword,<WH2719> and all<WH3605> the souls<WH5315> that<WH834> were therein he utterly destroyed<WH2763> that<WH1931> day,<WH3117> according to all<WH3605> that<WH834> he had done<WH6213> to Lachish.<WH3923>
And Joshua<WH3091> went up<WH5927> from Eglon,<WH4480> <WH5700> and all<WH3605> Israel<WH3478> with<WH5973> him, unto Hebron;<WH2275> and they fought<WH3898> against<WH5921> it:

And they took<WH3920> it, and smote<WH5221> it with the edge<WH6310> of the sword,<WH2719> and the king<WH4428> thereof, and all<WH3605> the cities<WH5892> thereof, and all<WH3605> the souls<WH5315> that<WH834> were therein; he left<WH7604> none<WH3808> remaining,<WH8300> according to all<WH3605> that<WH834> he had done<WH6213> to Eglon;<WH5700> but destroyed<WH2763> it utterly, and all<WH3605> the souls<WH5315> that<WH834> were therein.
And Joshua<WH3091> returned,<WH7725> and all<WH3605> Israel<WH3478> with<WH5973> him, to Debir;<WH1688> and fought<WH3898> against<WH5921> it:

And he took<WH3920> it, and the king<WH4428> thereof, and all<WH3605> the cities<WH5892> thereof; and they smote<WH5221> them with the edge<WH6310> of the sword,<WH2719> and utterly destroyed<WH2763> <WH853> all<WH3605> the souls<WH5315> that<WH834> were therein; he left<WH7604> none<WH3808> remaining:<WH8300> as<WH834> he had done<WH6213> to Hebron,<WH2275> so<WH3651> he did<WH6213> to Debir,<WH1688> and to the king<WH4428> thereof; as<WH834> he had done<WH6213> also to Libnah,<WH3841> and to her king.<WH4428>

So Joshua<WH3091> smote<WH5221> <WH853> all<WH3605> the country<WH776> of the hills,<WH2022> and of the south,<WH5045> and of the vale,<WH8219> and of the springs,<WH794> and all<WH3605> their kings:<WH4428> he left<WH7604> none<WH3808> remaining,<WH8300> but utterly destroyed<WH2763> all<WH3605> that breathed,<WH5397> as<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> commanded.<WH6680>
And Joshua<WH3091> smote<WH5221> them from Kadesh-barnea<WH4480> <WH6947> even unto<WH5704> Gaza,<WH5804> and all<WH3605> the country<WH776> of Goshen,<WH1657> even unto<WH5704> Gibeon.<WH1391>

And all<WH3605> these<WH428> kings<WH4428> and their land<WH776> did Joshua<WH3091> take<WH3920> at one<WH259> time,<WH6471> because<WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> fought<WH3898> for Israel.<WH3478>
And Joshua<WH3091> returned,<WH7725> and all<WH3605> Israel<WH3478> with<WH5973> him, unto<WH413> the camp<WH4264> to Gilgal.<WH1537>
